parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear ball joint can cause the wheel to come off while driving, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The wheel comes off while driving
the vehicle pulls to one side
the ball joint cracks or breaks
the tire comes off the car.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to stall or lose power, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities, especially if it occurs while driving at high speeds.
symptoms: the vehicle stalls or loses power
the clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the wheel bearing can cause the loss of Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) and traction control, leading to reduced vehicle stability and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: the ABS and traction control systems are lost
the wheel comes off while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Steering system failure can cause loss of control, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
Front end problems can cause loss of control, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
Ignition system failure can cause the vehicle to stall or not start, leaving the driver stranded.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Water Ingress and Retention in Body Panels
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Water accumulation in the body panels can cause mildew, rust, and corrosion, leading to structural damage and compromising the vehicle's safety and performance.
symptoms: Water accumulation in the rocker panels
need to scoop out water and use a wet-vac daily.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden separation of the hood can cause accidents, injuries, and fatalities, as well as damage to the vehicle and surrounding property.
symptoms: Hood separates from the vehicle while driving
no prior problems with the hood.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden failure of the trunk lid can cause injuries to occupants and bystanders, as well as damage to the vehicle and surrounding property.
symptoms: no prior problems with the trunk lid.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The disintegration of the convertible top's threads and glue can cause the top to become dislodged while driving, posing a major safety hazard to occupants.
symptoms: Thread holding the top together disintegrates
glue holding the back glass window disintegrates
need to staple the fabric together to keep the window from falling out.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the floor shift ignition/park interlock can cause the vehicle to shift into gear unexpectedly, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The vehicle shifts into gear without the key in the "on" position
the vehicle rolls or moves unexpectedly
the shift lever can be moved out of park without the brake pedal being depressed
the vehicle experiences sudden and unexplained acceleration.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission slippage can cause the vehicle to lose power or accelerate unexpectedly, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The transmission slips into reverse without the key in the "on" position
the vehicle experiences sudden and unexplained acceleration
the vehicle rolls or moves unexpectedly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning alarm system can cause inconvenience, distraction, and potential safety risks due to the sudden and loud honking.
symptoms: honking repeatedly or with a long
and may not stop until the battery is disconnected.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ignition system can cause the vehicle to stall or become inoperable, leading to safety risks and inconvenience.
symptoms: the key cylinder needs to be replaced frequently
and the vehicle may not start.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause various components to malfunction, leading to safety risks and inconvenience.
symptoms: the wiring needs to be replaced
the neutral control switch needs to be replaced
and the dashboard lights go out.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the BCM can cause various electrical components to malfunction, leading to safety risks and inconvenience.
